pr_title: TRUNK-5854: Change of object type to primitive

timeline.message: TRUNK-5854: Change of object type to primitive

timeline.bodyText: Thanks @sacull for this , why didnt you first make an integer a variable first, something like For (Integer int )
timeline.author: sherrif10

replies.bodyText: @sherrif10  Integer and int are all data types,they cant be used together.Integer is for object and int is for primitive.
replies.author: HerbertYiga
